titleStmt.title: Capt. Badiley's reply to certaine declarations from Capt. Seamen, Cap. Ell, & Cap. Fisher as he found them divulged abroad in a fallacious pamphlet, called The remonstrance of the fight neer Legorn, between the English and the Dutch. : As also many other particulars, as they were presented to his Excellency the Lord General Cromwell, and the Right Honourable, the Councell of State.
titleStmt.author: Badiley, Richard, d. 1657.
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.
Appleton, Henry, fl. 1650-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons, in Aldersgate-streete,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles, California.
